post:
GreenValueHost is a premium customer-centric company founded on October 16, 2012 with a mission to exceed excellence in providing industry leading web hosting solutions. To this day, GreenValueHost has a profitable, rapidly expanding company, managing thousands of domains from clients all over the globe.

To celebrate ONE YEAR of Excellence and the week of our ONE YEAR ANNIVERSARY, GreenValueHost is having a HUGE SALE on ALL of our regularly offered Virtual Private Server Hosting plans from October 13 to October 20. All you need to do is order a hosting plan by October 20th and enter the promotional code "BDAYVPSSALE" to receive 30% OFF RECURRING on ANY PAYMENT TERM AND A FREE MONTH OF SERVICE!

Our Virtual Private Servers come with absolute FULL ROOT ACCESS and are equipped with some of the best hardware available on the market. Our Supermicro VPS Nodes feature Intel Xeon E3 series Haswell processors, at least 24GB of Super Talent DDR3 RAM, and more than plenty of Intel SSD Accelerated Disk Space available.
